    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public void handle(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
        A function that starts the game. If the previous saved states exist, they are deleted. The _numPlayers and the _gridSize is kept at read from the ComboBox in the home page. In case no option is selected, a default value of 0 is kept for _gridSize and 2 is kept for _numPlayers. Each player color is added to the player_colors ArrayList along with their color.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
        Parameters:
        e - the ActionEvent of the Start Game button clicked
